name: Dreams (itch) (Zacky2456)
description:
https://github.com/Zacky2456/Dreams-GameJamGame is a game I (@Zacky2456) and @Dking08 worked on as a submission to the I Can't Write But I want to tell a story Game Jam The Game is basically a Platformer Game, in which you look for Memories in your protagonist's Dreams.

You can see all of the updates/changes that have been made to the game here.

The Source code of the game can be found at the Github repository at https://github.com/Zacky2456/Dreams-GameJamGame
